version.description: A version field which follows semver - e.g. v1.0.0
version.title: version

UrlString.description: a string that fulfills the URL requirements (as per RFC 3986)
UrlString.title: UrlString

Date.description: a string to be decoded into a Date

TrimmedNonEmpty.description: a non-empty string with no leading or trailing whitespace
TrimmedNonEmpty.title: TrimmedNonEmpty
